MajorClaims.Text: human needs should be considered more
nowadays humans need farmland, housing and industry

Claims.Text: increasing population are more important than saving land for endangered animals
they do not need so much land that people need
farmlands are vital for human life
they need land to build their houses on it
some lands should be assigned to industry

Premises.Text: day by day population is increasing
human needs for food is increasing as well
the population of endangered animals are less than people's population
We need farmland to grow crops such as wheat and corn, and there is no doubt that without food people cannot alive for more than some weeks
people need shelters to protect themselves from mother nature such as wind and flood and wild animals
Dwelling is one of the most important human needs after food which is undeniable
human need some crucial things to continue their life, and most of them are industrial such as medicine
Todays life has some difficulty which become comfortable with the help of industry
